name: Arcade Zombie
description:
Arcade Zombie is a simple survival top-down closed arena shooter game , where you will face wave after wave of terrifying zombie that will come crawling out of the possessed arcade machines. Equip yourself with increasingly powerful weapons and make the most kills as many as you dare!

CONTROL KEYS : UPWUP ARROWDOWNSDOWN ARROWLEFTALEFT ARROWRIGHTDRIGHT ARROWSHOOTLMB-CHANGE  WEAPONE-PAUSEESC-
CREDITS :

Programmer and Artist :  Pisit Touravong 

Music Composer : Benjamin Goldman >> BenjaminGoldmanMusic
